mapper.sql: id, name, address, startTime, endTime, dateTime, state
mapper.insert: insert into tb_company (id, name, address, startTime, endTime, dateTime, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tb_company
id,
name,
address,
startTime,
endTime,
dateTime,
state,

mapper.update:
update tb_company
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dateTime = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
